article.title: Status and history for [kat]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: stage 5: Final revision of the text by Natia Bagbaia, addressing various language issues in the OHCHR text. Reviewed by Natia Burduli.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
